div.p: Codes that define types of additional text that may be associated with a Questionnaire group or question.
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-question-text-type

tr.td: Identifies the units in which the question's answer should be captured

div.p: In addition, this value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are part of http://hl7.org/fhir/vs/valueset-questionnaire-text-type

description.value: Codes that define types of additional text that may be associated with a Questionnaire group or question.

definition.value: Identifies the units in which the question's answer should be captured
